nodes.text: Xomit Transport Systems (XTS) was a shipping company based out of Falleen. Suspected to be under the control of the Black Sun criminal syndicate, Xomit Transport Systems was led by Chairman Xomit Grunseit during the Clone Wars, who was also in command of Black Sun during the war.
During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Mandalorian Ketsu Onyo served as a security retainer for Xomit Transport Systems, while also acting as a bounty hunter for Black Sun.
